languages.text: {n}Увы, отряд был слишком утомлен тяжелым переходом, обескровлен потерями. Воины были сметены призраками, и лишь единицам удалось уцелеть. Спустя несколько часов яркая вспышка осветила леса, и ударная волна от чудовищного взрыва прокатилась по всей планете, обращая в прах агрокомплексы.{/n}

{n}Alas, the von Valancius forces were too drained by the long march and the losses they sustained. The whole squad was wiped out by the ghosts, only a handful surviving the massacre. Several hours later, a bright flash lit up the forests, and a shock wave from some colossal explosion swept across the entire surface of the planet, turning the agri-complexes to dust.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Увы, отряд был слишком утомлен тяжелым переходом, обескровлен потерями. Воины были сметены призраками, и лишь единицам удалось уцелеть. Спустя несколько часов яркая вспышка осветила леса, и ударная волна от чудовищного взрыва прокатилась по всей планете, обращая в прах агрокомплексы.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Alas, the von Valancius forces were too drained by the long march and the losses they had sustained. The troop was wiped out by the ghosts, and only a handful survived the massacre. Several hours later, a bright flash lit up the forests, and a shock wave from a colossal explosion swept across the entire surface of the planet, turning the agri-complexes into dust.{/n}

Several hours later, a bright flash lit up the forests, and a shock wave from some colossal explosion swept across the entire surface of the planet, turning the agri-complexes to dust.{/n}

languages.text: {n}遗憾的是，冯·瓦兰修斯的王朝部队由于长途行军与不断减员而疲惫不堪。整支小队都被幽灵消灭了，只有少数人在大屠杀中幸存下来。几个小时后，炫目的闪光照亮了森林。森林中发生了巨大的爆炸，由此而来的冲击波席卷了整颗行星表面，将无数综合农业中心化成了灰烬。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Alas, the von Valancius forces were too drained by the long march and the losses they sustained. The whole squad was wiped out by the ghosts, only a handful surviving the massacre. Several hours later, a bright flash lit up the forests, and a shock wave from some colossal explosion swept across the entire surface of the planet, turning the agri-complexes to dust.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}遗憾的是，冯·瓦兰修斯的王朝部队由于长途行军与不断减员而疲惫不堪。整支小队都被幽灵消灭了，只有少数人在大屠杀中幸存下来。几个小时后，炫目的闪光照亮了森林。森林中发生了巨大的爆炸，由此而来的冲击波席卷了整颗行星表面，将无数综合农业中心化成了灰烬。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Por desgracia, las fuerzas von Valancius estaban demasiado agotadas por la larga marcha y las pérdidas sufridas. Todo el escuadrón fue aniquilado por los fantasmas, y solo un puñado sobrevivió a la masacre. Varias horas más tarde, un destello brillante iluminó los bosques, y una onda expansiva de alguna explosión colosal barrió toda la superficie del planeta, convirtiendo los agrocomplejos en polvo.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Alas, the von Valancius forces were too drained by the long march and the losses they sustained. The whole squad was wiped out by the ghosts, only a handful surviving the massacre. Several hours later, a bright flash lit up the forests, and a shock wave from some colossal explosion swept across the entire surface of the planet, turning the agri-complexes to dust.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Por desgracia, las fuerzas von Valancius estaban demasiado agotadas por la larga marcha y las pérdidas sufridas. Todo el escuadrón fue aniquilado por los fantasmas, y solo un puñado sobrevivió a la masacre. Varias horas más tarde, un destello brillante iluminó los bosques, y una onda expansiva de alguna explosión colosal barrió toda la superficie del planeta, convirtiendo los agrocomplejos en polvo.{/n}

languages.text: {n}しかし、フォン・ヴァランシウス軍は長い行軍と多くのものを失ったことで消耗しきっていた。ゴーストによって分隊は全滅し、虐殺から生き残ったのはほんの一握りだった。数時間後、明るい閃光が森を照らし、巨大な爆発による衝撃波が惑星の全面を覆い尽くすと、農業施設は塵と化した。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Alas, the von Valancius forces were too drained by the long march and the losses they sustained. The whole squad was wiped out by the ghosts, only a handful surviving the massacre. Several hours later, a bright flash lit up the forests, and a shock wave from some colossal explosion swept across the entire surface of the planet, turning the agri-complexes to dust.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}しかし、フォン・ヴァランシウス軍は長い行軍と多くのものを失ったことで消耗しきっていた。ゴーストによって分隊は全滅し、虐殺から生き残ったのはほんの一握りだった。数時間後、明るい閃光が森を照らし、巨大な爆発による衝撃波が惑星の全面を覆い尽くすと、農業施設は塵と化した。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Hélas, les troupes de la dynastie von Valancius sont trop affectées par la longue marche et les pertes qu'elles ont subies. L'escouade est anéantie par les spectres et seule une poignée de soldats survit. Quelques heures plus tard, un éclair aveuglant illumine les forêts alentour, puis l'onde de choc d'une explosion colossale déferle sur toute la planète et réduit les agri-complexes en poussière.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Alas, the von Valancius forces were too drained by the long march and the losses they sustained. The whole squad was wiped out by the ghosts, only a handful surviving the massacre. Several hours later, a bright flash lit up the forests, and a shock wave from some colossal explosion swept across the entire surface of the planet, turning the agri-complexes to dust.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Hélas, les troupes de la dynastie von Valancius sont trop affectées par la longue marche et les pertes qu'elles ont subies. L'escouade est anéantie par les spectres et seule une poignée de soldats survit. Quelques heures plus tard, un éclair aveuglant illumine les forêts alentour, puis l'onde de choc d'une explosion colossale déferle sur toute la planète et réduit les agri-complexes en poussière.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Leider waren die Valancius-Truppen durch den langen Marsch und die erlittenen Verluste jedoch arg erschöpft und dezimiert. Der ganze Trupp wurde von den Geistern ausgelöscht, nur eine Handvoll überlebten das Massaker. Einige stunden später erhellte ein gleißender Blitz die Wälder, und die Schockwelle einer gigantischen Explosion fegte über die gesamte Oberfläche des Planeten und verwandelte die Agri-Komplex zu Staub.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Alas, the von Valancius forces were too drained by the long march and the losses they sustained. The whole squad was wiped out by the ghosts, only a handful surviving the massacre. Several hours later, a bright flash lit up the forests, and a shock wave from some colossal explosion swept across the entire surface of the planet, turning the agri-complexes to dust.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Leider waren die Valancius-Truppen durch den langen Marsch und die erlittenen Verluste jedoch arg erschöpft und dezimiert. Einige stunden später erhellte ein gleißender Blitz die Wälder, und die Schockwelle einer gigantischen Explosion fegte über die gesamte Oberfläche des Planeten und verwandelte die Agri-Komplex zu Staub.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Ne yazık ki von Valancius kuvvetleri, uzun bir yürüyüş ve verilen zayiat sonrasında bir hayli bitkin düştü. Tüm manga, hayaletler tarafından yok edildi. Katliamdan yalnızca bir avuç asker sağ kurtuldu. Saatler sonra ormanı göz alıcı bir ışık aydınlattı. Muazzam bir patlamanın ardından gelen bir şok dalgası, gezegenin tüm yüzeyini silip süpürerek tarım komplekslerini harabeye çevirdi.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Alas, the von Valancius forces were too drained by the long march and the losses they sustained. The whole squad was wiped out by the ghosts, only a handful surviving the massacre. Several hours later, a bright flash lit up the forests, and a shock wave from some colossal explosion swept across the entire surface of the planet, turning the agri-complexes to dust.{/n}
